content.en: Ensemble clustering: Researchers have been exploring the challenges and advantages of using consensus functions in clustering ensembles. Algorithms are being used to combine multiple partitions generated by different clustering algorithms into a single clustering solution. They are also investigating how to improve the quality of cluster ensembles by selecting a subset of base clusters using algorithms. Additionally, researchers are proposing new algorithms and frameworks to extend ensemble clustering approaches to hierarchical clustering methods and reduce the number of clusters in cluster analysis. These algorithms aim to enhance the efficiency, strength, reliability, and stability of clustering.
content.da: Ensemble clustering: Forskere har udforsket udfordringerne og fordelene ved at bruge konsensusfunktioner i clustering ensembles. Algoritmer bruges til at kombinere flere partitioner genereret af forskellige clustering-algoritmer til en enkelt clustering-løsning. De undersøger også, hvordan man kan forbedre kvaliteten af clustering ensembles ved at vælge et delmængde af baseklynger ved hjælp af algoritmer. Ydermere foreslår forskere nye algoritmer og rammer for at udvide ensemble clustering-tilgange til hierarkiske clustering-metoder og reducere antallet af klynger i cluster-analyse. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre effektiviteten, styrken, pålideligheden og stabiliteten af clustering.
